desc:
AI agents are a type of artificial intelligence (AI) system that can understand and respond to customer inquiries without human intervention.

They are created using an agent builder, like Agentforce.

AI Agents can include anything from answering simple questions to resolving complex issues.

Can continuously improve their own performance through self-learning.
Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that provides systems the ability to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.
Natural language processing (NLP) is a branch of AI that focuses on the interaction between computers and humans using natural language.
